attributes.review:
I got this app hoping it would provide me with my daily updates on our wonderful god chosen truth teller President! 

Instead it was full of fake news.  So sad.  What a loser app.

Then it stole all of my data and sold it to China.  Even bigger of a loser app.

I am so disappointed in this LYING AWFUL FAKE NEWS SPREADING APP.  

GOD BLESS USA AND MAY THIS APP BE DAMNED LIKE THEN ALL THE SNOWFLAKES.
